# Replace YOUR_PUBLISHER_ID with your actual AdSense publisher ID after approval
# Format: google.com, pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0
#
# Instructions:
# 1. Apply for Google AdSense at https://www.google.com/adsense/
# 2. Once approved, you'll receive a publisher ID (starts with "pub-")
# 3. Replace the placeholder below with your actual publisher ID
# 4. Remove the # from the beginning of the line
#
# google.com, pub-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0
